document_data.name: Michil Franzt
document_data.mainbody: '''Michil Franzt''' was a [[tiefling]] [[proxy]] of the [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian]] [[power]] known as [[Helm]]. He was among the few proxies that one could find on the [[plane]] of [[Mechanus]].
document_data.Description: Michil had reddish skin due to his tiefling heritage and was incredibly tall.
document_data.Personality: This proxy was a very proud man, secure in his belief that there had rarely ever been a guardian of Helm as good as himself. He spoke only rarely, for he considered himself bound to his words.
document_data.History: The origins of Michil were a mystery to others. Some believed he came from the [[Prime Material plane]], others that he was a [[outsider|planar]], and some that he was a [[petitioner]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Rumors surrounding Michil claimed that he was capable of perceiving ill-will from miles away.
